医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
多目标粪便 DNA 测试显示出早期结直肠癌检测的希望泰国最近的一项前瞻性横断面研究表明，多目标粪便 DNA 检测对于检测泰国个体中的结直肠癌 (CRC) 具有高度敏感性和特异性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Multitarget-stool-DNA-test-shows-promise-for-early-colorectal-cancer-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Multitarget-stool-DNA-test-shows-promise-for-early-colorectal-cancer-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9311c6fe-e6c3-4c4a-91e2-80b94662b23e Wed, 06 Nov 2024 12:52:00 -0500 Multitarget stool DNA test shows promise for early colorectal cancer detection
纳米级传感器通过呼吸化学检测肺癌呼出的气体中含有有关体内发生情况的化学线索，包括肺癌等疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Nanoscale-sensor-detects-lung-cancer-through-breath-chemistry.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Nanoscale-sensor-detects-lung-cancer-through-breath-chemistry.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a16b998-0eba-409c-90a2-2167325b2267 Wed, 06 Nov 2024 12:48:35 -0500 Nanoscale sensor detects lung cancer through breath chemistry
世界首项比较研究显示单孔机器人胸腺切除术的安全性联合研究小组（高丽大学医学院胸心血管外科教授 Jun-hee Lee、Hyun-koo Kim、Jin-Wook Hwang、Jae-Ho Chung）公布了世界上第一个单项研究的比较结果使用单端口机器人系统进行端口机器人胸腺切除术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Worlde28099s-first-comparative-study-shows-safety-of-single-port-robotic-thymection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Worlde28099s-first-comparative-study-shows-safety-of-single-port-robotic-thymcision.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b7a57658-37b3-4664-bbfc-6ab35303b1b3 Wed, 06 Nov 2024 12:44:46 -0500 World’s first comparative study shows safety of single-port robotic thymectomy
世卫组织报告强调 2023 年结核病病例和死亡人数激增根据世界卫生组织 (WHO) 发布的一份报告，2023 年记录了自全球监测开始以来结核病 (TB) 病例数最高的一年。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/WHO-report-highlights-surge-in-TB-cases-and-deaths-in-2023.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/WHO-report-highlights-surge-in-TB-cases-and-deaths-in-2023.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=223ccd39-9f71-4814-9a4e-c1cedd61d0c6 Wed, 06 Nov 2024 12:40:13 -0500 WHO report highlights surge in TB cases and deaths in 2023
与已婚人士相比，未婚人士出现抑郁症状的可能性高出 80%研究表明，受酒精和吸烟的影响，未婚者面临更高的抑郁风险，凸显了文化对心理健康的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Unmarried-individuals-8025-more-likely-to-experience-depressive-symptoms-compared-to-married-counterparts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Unmarried-individuals-8025-more-likely-to-experience-depressive-symptoms-compared-to-married-counterparts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=455fdc0e-fabf-449c-9440-1e6906bd0f37 Wed, 06 Nov 2024 12:03:00 -0500 Unmarried individuals 80% more likely to experience depressive symptoms compared to married counterparts
饱和脂肪加速多发性硬化症的神经退行性变靶向神经酰胺合酶可以通过限制神经酰胺 C16 合成来降低多发性硬化症的严重程度，从而提供潜在的神经保护策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Saturated-fats-accelerate-neurodegenesis-in-multiple-sclerosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Saturated-fats-accelerate-neurodegenesis-in-multiple-sclerosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=58df9525-da95-44bc-ab1c-9651e0cb9386 Wed, 06 Nov 2024 11:26:00 -0500 Saturated fats accelerate neurodegeneration in multiple sclerosis
10 个州中有 7 个州支持堕胎权。但还没有什么改变。周二，在投票中出现堕胎问题的 10 个州中，有 7 个州的选民支持堕胎权——乍一看，这似乎重塑了美国错综复杂的堕胎规则。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/7-of-10-states-backed-abortion-rights-But-little-to-change-yet.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/7-of-10-states-backed-abortion-rights-But-little-to-change-yet.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dbc1b59c-1c27-427f-b1d8-e6957a5be246 Wed, 06 Nov 2024 10:29:56 -0500 7 of 10 states backed abortion rights. But little to change yet.
工作压力会增加不利心血管健康措施的风险在美国大量没有心血管疾病的多种族成年人群体中，那些承受工作压力的人更有可能出现心血管健康状况不佳的情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Work-stress-increases-risk-of-unfavorable-cardioangio-health-measures.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Work-stress-increases-risk-of-unfavorable-cardioangio-health-measures.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=75b409da-59b3-42bd-98eb-7deca907be2c Wed, 06 Nov 2024 08:08:52 -0500 Work stress increases risk of unfavorable cardiovascular health measures
研究人员获得 4500 万加元用于研究新的精神病治疗方法百分之一的人在一生中会经历精神病发作，这些通常出现在青春期末或成年早期。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Researchers-receive-CADc2a045c2a0million-to-study-new-psychosis-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Researchers-receive-CADc2a045c2a0million-to-study-new-psychosis-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8fd1f952-60c9-4fab-9055-9ca60bc68f2d Wed, 06 Nov 2024 08:01:43 -0500 Researchers receive CAD 45 million to study new psychosis treatments
特朗普重返白宫准备搅乱医疗保健安全网前总统唐纳德·特朗普的选举胜利和即将重返白宫可能会带来缩减国家公共健康保险计划的变化——增加未参保率，同时对堕胎和其他生殖保健设置新的障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Trumpe28099s-White-House-return-poished-to-tangle-health-care-safety-net.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/Trumpe28099s-White-House-return-poished-to-tangle-health-care-safety-net.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1509d992-f3dc-412e-a446-c503e48d5e0a Wed, 06 Nov 2024 07:38:24 -0500 Trump’s White House return poised to tangle health care safety net
